credit_line: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
title: Squid Costume Design for the Opera "Sadko" by Rimsky-Korsakov
provenance: T.A.T. Galleries, Inc., New York, NY
medium: Brush and red, green, orange and blue gouache, graphite on paper
description: Red-bodied and green-tentacled squid costume with orange, green and blue dots. A figure with raised arms, stockinged feet, and green headress is visible through the superimposed squid (tentacles at the top).
name: Drawing
